p: For the FF-WCE and SF-WCE scenarios, we compared simulated results with the observed area burned from the Monitoring Trends in Burn Severity (MTBS) [ 36] fire perimeter dataset ( https://www.mtbs.gov/) dataset. We also compared simulated results for aboveground live woody biomass (AGB), aboveground dead woody carbon (AGD), and total aboveground woody carbon (AGT) densities and pools with published modeled results based on observed Forest Inventory and Analysis (FIA) National Program ( https://www.fia.fs.fed.us/) data ([ 37], hereafter, Hudiburg, available on Data Basin, http://bit.ly/2CcZ7wK; [ 38, 14, 39]. To reflect the influence of land use, we limited our results to non human-affected (NHA) based on the LandFire US 140 EVT dataset (landfire.gov; 30m x 30m).
